duties_responsibilities.duty: Verify identification and insurance, complete Point of Entry for OTP and OBOT individuals, enroll in programs and/or add to waitlist.
Develop trusting, respectful relationships with participants and providers.
Operate telephone and voice mail systems in a timely and welcoming manner, greet and direct clients in a courteous, professional manner.
Maintain appearance of waiting room, mail room and office areas, contact BHN staff to inform them of individuals’ arrivals and help individuals get to their destination in the building.
Assist with processing paperwork and data by using office equipment, including filing, entering appointments, data entry, and recordkeeping.
Maintain organized file systems and keep an inventory of office supplies and order in a cost-effective manner.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED required. Basic computer skills. Minimum of six months of office experience required. Bilingual English/Spanish Speaking preferred.
